basics.name: Kevin Jovy
basics.label: Web and App Developer
basics.summary: With more than 2 years of experience in web app development. Turning ideas into code. Specialized in backend development, applying methodologies such as Clean Architecture to ensure well-structured and maintainable systems. My approach emphasizes the separation of responsibilities and code reusability, enabling scalable, efficient, and adaptable solutions.

work.name: Hubii

Cut delivery times and deployments to production by half. Collaborated with Mozilla and Telefónica to develop the first FirefoxOS TV app.
